label: Description
value: Vertical rectangles. Each tile with identical pattern of two flowers and leaves on continuous scrolling stem. One flower faces the observer and the other is in profile. Manganese violet on white ground.

label: Dimensions
value: H x W x D (lying flat): 6.5 x 6.8 x 12.8 cm (2 9/16 x 2 11/16 x 5 1/16 in.)

Study for the Violet Sargent Bronze Plaque in the Art Institute of Chicago

label: Description
value: Young woman, three-quarter-length, seated with head in profile, directed to right; hands in lap.  Enclosed in rectangle with filling of curved lines in upper right corner.  Below in small square, a bust with head in three-quarter view to right.

label: Physical description
value: Pen and purple ink on cream laid paper

label: Provenance
value: From the collection of Homer Saint-Gaudens

label: Notes
value: Young woman, three-quarter-length, seated with head in profile, directed to right; hands in lap. Enclosed in rectangle with filling of curved lines in upper right corner. Below in small square, a bust with head in three-quarter view to right.

label: Description
value: Two figures: at left a seated woman, head in profile facing right, leaning on right arm with left hand on knee; at right, in rectangular frame, a woman in a long gown standing facing the observer.

label: Provenance
value: From the collection of Homer Saint-Gaudens

label: Notes

label: Description
value: Rectangular darning sampler with fifteen darning crosses and two corner mends, with picot edgings and hemstitching. In the center square, where the foundation fabric has been cut away and replaced, the inscription GD 1711, surmounted by a crown, is embroidered in red cross stitch.

label: Physical description
value: Medium: silk embroidery, linen foundation Technique: embroidered in running (pattern darning) and cross stitches on plain weave Label: linen embroidered with silk in pattern darning and cross stitches

label: Description
value: Small wooden block with raised design of an open rose and leaves.

label: Credit line
value: gift of Mrs. Harry Horton Benkard

label: Description
value: Made of strap-like scrolls of iron joined in reverse position and terminating in a leaf-shaped bobeche with four prickets, the central one threaded at the base.  Outer edges of scrolls with double frill of continuous, pierced leaf ornament.

label: Provenance
value: Edward F. Caldwell; 1937: acquired by Museum

label: Credit line
value: Gift of Edward F. Caldwell & Company

label: Description
value: Couchant lion with haunches spread, the back spanned by a flat plate with three holes, probably for attaching to base of candlestick. Protruding tongue, two tails, shell and volute scrolls.

label: Provenance
value: Edward F. Caldwell; 1937: acquired by Museum

label: Credit line
value: Gift of Edward F. Caldwell and Company

label: Description
value: Deep round collar of net with an alloever embroidered floral design. Sawtooth scallops and tiny dots powdered over the ground. Initial "C" embroidered in center back.

label: Description
value: Strip of insertion lace in design of concentric circles, each with central rosette.

value: Medium: linen Technique: bobbin lace, discontinuous tape

label: Physical description
value: Medium: linen Technique: bobbin lace, peasant style

label: Description
value: Natural-colored linen with a cut-out design outlined in buttonhole stitches. Border of five-petal blossoms and a central rosette with foliage.

label: Physical description
value: Medium: linen Technique: cutwork, buttonhole stitches

label: Description
value: Dark blue resist print on a white ground. Design shows serpentine branches with ornamental foliage and perching bird. White dots used to suggest detail in the foliage and on birds.

label: Physical description
value: Medium: cotton Technique: resist printed on plain weave

label: Description
value: Fragment with a blue ground and tiny sprigs and blossoms in white and light blue.

value: Medium: cotton Technique printed on plain weave

label: Description
value: Green and ivory band in a large-scale floral design. Heavy cord for outlining.

value: Heavy brown fabric with fragmentary serpentine floral design embroidered in polychrome wools yarns in split stitfch.

label: Description
value: Fragment of striped wool velvet showing broad stripes of blue and rose with narrow stripes of tan, rose, yellow, and blue.

label: Description
value: Fragment with a greenish-black ground and a design of tiny allover roses and five-petal flowers in rose, white, yellow and brown.

value: Medium: cotton Technique: printed on plain weave

label: Description
value: Valance resist printed in two shades of blue in a design of undulating branches with large cup-shaped blossoms and curling leaves with pendant fruit. Three points on lower border. Edged with cotton tape, white with a narrow border of blue on either edge. Backed with sateen.

label: Physical description
value: Medium: cotton Technique: blue resist on plain weave
